name: VIOSO
overview:
The story of VIOSO starts in 2004 at the Bauhaus University in Weimar with the â€œsmartprojectorâ€ venture. Through the subsequent creation of VIOSO GmbH in 2007, the brilliant idea of projection on any surface was presented to the marketplace in the form of a software package. Since then it has undergone a rigorous development programme and today a team of 13 employees apply themselves to achieve VIOSOâ€™s goal: â€œTo supply international software for presentations!â€

In 2010 the VIOSO Presenter was released as a brand new version of the old product smartprojecting. This software brings a change into the philosophy of presentations: away from simply show information to entertain you audience. Simply enhance your presentation without any previous knowledge. Use familiar programs such as PowerPoint, Word or PhotoShop as well as pictures, videos etc. and simply dragâ€™n drop them into the VIOSO Presenter. Display your presentation with special 3 D effects such as picture-in-picture with a self chosen background image.

Together with the media server specialist AV Stumpfl, VIOSO developed Wings VIOSO to create and control professional shows and events. Wings VIOSO is a combination of VIOSO-technology, therefore providing automatic multi display projections, stacking and warping in addition to wall correction technology and AV Stumpflâ€™s powerful media server Wings Platinum.

Also, several bespoke projects according to client specifications are in progress under the name VIOSO development.
